publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3678 Aileen Campbell: Wales Can, The Independence Initiative—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of www.walescan.com, Plaid Cymru’s new website to promote the debate about independence for Wales; notes that the site features a collection of films and articles by prominent Welsh politicians and commentators discussing the future of Wales and the kind of nation that they envisage Wales becoming; believes that the launch of the site demonstrates growing confidence among people in Wales for greater autonomy and powers for the National Assembly for Wales, and looks forward to continuing, alongside the National Assembly for Wales, on the journey to independence. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Anne McLaughlin*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Bill Wilson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Willie Coffey*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-3678 Wales Can, The Independence Initiative (lodged on 11 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*

S3M-3678 Aileen Campbell: Wales Can, The Independence Initiative—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of www.walescan.com, Plaid Cymru’s new website to promote the debate about independence for Wales; notes that the site features a collection of films and articles by prominent Welsh politicians and commentators discussing the future of Wales and the kind of nation that they envisage Wales becoming; believes that the launch of the site demonstrates growing confidence among people in Wales for greater autonomy and powers for the National Assembly for Wales, and looks forward to continuing, alongside the National Assembly for Wales, on the journey to independence. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Jamie Hepburn, Anne McLaughlin, Bob Doris, Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Bill Wilson, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Willie Coffey, Joe FitzPatrick, Stuart McMillan, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3678 Wales Can, The Independence Initiative (lodged on 11 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
